name: Vipul Kumar
position: Project Lead at Axtria - Ingenious Insights | ML | NLP | ETL | Data Warehousing | Tableau
about: I am a technocrat with 3 years of experience in ETL and dashboards development. Working as a Senior Associate at Axtria. Acting as a SME of tableau for both internal and external teams. Have an extensive experience on ETL tool like Matillion, DataStage. Have worked on Reporting, Data Warehousing, SQL, Snowflake, Redshift, Databricks and Tableau dashboards development.

positions.subtitle: Axtria - Ingenious Insights
positions.description: â€¢	Led and developed standardized dashboard for Client with automated insights to create a one stop shop for the Company's CXO to view weekly performance of all brands. 20 hrs effort savings per week (1040 hrs savings per year) was achieved through automation of weekly tracker process.â€¢	Played a key role in optimizing performance for one of the dashboard, by reducing loading time from ~40 sec to ~4 sec.â€¢	Working on multiple short-term projects and acting as a subject matter expert for Tableau-related work for both internal and external teams.
positions.title: Senior Associate
positions.description_html:
â€¢ Led and developed standardized dashboard for Client with automated insights to create a one stop shop for the Company's CXO to view weekly performance of all brands. 20 hrs effort savings per week (1040 hrs savings per year) was achieved through automation of weekly tracker process.
â€¢ Played a key role in optimizing performance for one of the dashboard, by reducing loading time from ~40 sec to ~4 sec.
â€¢ Working on multiple short-term projects and acting as a subject matter expert for Tableau-related work for both internal and external teams.

positions.subtitle: Axtria - Ingenious Insights
positions.description: â€¢	Worked on a long-term development project to built dashboard for 2 major brands for a pharmaceutical company providing their market performance, sales and call level data.â€¢	Along with this, provided a deep dive into the demand performance based on specialty and indications, patient level data with to/from switching information for brands and subnational information with writer assessment for multiple time periods.â€¢	Iteratively designed compact and highly visual dashboards with Key Performance Indicators for each area (Summary, Demand, Sub National & Patient level data).
positions.title: Data Associate
positions.description_html:
â€¢ Worked on a long-term development project to built dashboard for 2 major brands for a pharmaceutical company providing their market performance, sales and call level data.
â€¢ Along with this, provided a deep dive into the demand performance based on specialty and indications, patient level data with to/from switching information for brands and subnational information with writer assessment for multiple time periods.
â€¢ Iteratively designed compact and highly visual dashboards with Key Performance Indicators for each area (Summary, Demand, Sub National & Patient level data).

positions.subtitle: Axtria - Ingenious Insights
positions.description: â€¢	Design, Developed, and reconciled efficient data pipelines for clients, ensuring seamless extraction, transformation and loading of data using Matillion and Snowflake.â€¢	Created comprehensive Requirement, Design, STTM and SOP documents to provide clear project documentation.â€¢	Leveraged Airflow for orchestration and scheduling of ETL jobs, automating data workflows into Snowflake.â€¢	Provided support to internal teams by assisting them in troubleshooting and issue resolution.
positions.title: Data Analyst
positions.description_html:
â€¢ Design, Developed, and reconciled efficient data pipelines for clients, ensuring seamless extraction, transformation and loading of data using Matillion and Snowflake.
â€¢ Created comprehensive Requirement, Design, STTM and SOP documents to provide clear project documentation.
â€¢ Leveraged Airflow for orchestration and scheduling of ETL jobs, automating data workflows into Snowflake.
â€¢ Provided support to internal teams by assisting them in troubleshooting and issue resolution.
